burnProof(bytes4,bytes,bytes,bytes4,uint.details: Makes isTransferred flag true for the paid requests

params._blockNumber: Height of the block containing the burn transaction
params._burnReqIndexes: Indexes of requests that locker wants to provide proof for them
params._index: Index of transaction containing the burn transaction in the block
params._intermediateNodes: Merkle inclusion proof for transaction containing the burn transaction
params._lockerLockingScript: Locker's locking script (on Bitcoin) that this burn request belongs to
params._locktime: Lock time of the transaction containing the burn transaction
params._version: Version of the transaction containing the burn transaction
params._vin: Inputs of the transaction containing the burn transaction
params._vout: Outputs of the transaction containing the burn transaction
params._voutIndexes: Indexes of outputs that were used to pay burn requests (_voutIndexes[i] belongs to _burnReqIndexes[i])

ccBurn(uint256,bytes,uint8,bytes).details: After submitting the burn request, lockers have a limited time                                      to send BTC and provide burn proof

params._amount: Amount of teleBTC that user wants to burn
params._lockerLockingScript: Locking script of locker that should execute the burn request

returns._burntAmount: Amount of teleBTC that user will receive (after reducing fees)

params._bitcoinFee: Fee of submitting a transaction on Bitcoin
params._protocolPercentageFee: Percentage of tokens that user pays to protocol for burning
params._slasherPercentageReward: Percentage of tokens that slasher receives after slashing a locker
params._transferDeadline: Dealine of sending BTC to user (aster submitting a burn request)
params._treasury: Address of the treasury of the protocol

params._indices: Array of indices of the requests that their deadline has passed
params._lockerLockingScript: locker's locking script that the unpaid request belongs to

disputeLocker(bytes,bytes4[],bytes,bytes.details: Input tx is a malicious tx which shows that locker spent BTC                                         Output tx is the tx that was spent by locker in input tx

params._indexesAndBlockNumbers: Indices of malicious input in input tx, input tx in block and block number of input tx
params._inputIntermediateNodes: Merkle inclusion proof for the malicious transaction
params._locktimes: Locktimes of input and output tx
params._versions: Versions of input and output tx

params._index: The index of the request for the locker
params._lockerTargetAddress: Locker's address on the target chain

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

setTransferDeadline(uint256).details: Only owner can call this                                     Deadline shoudl be greater than relay finalization parameter

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

CCBurn(address,bytes,uint8,uint256,uint2.notice: Emits when a burn request gets submitted

LockerDispute(address,uint256,bytes32,ui.notice: Emits when a locker gets slashed for withdrawing BTC without proper reason

PaidCCBurn(address,bytes,uint256,address.notice: Emits when a burn proof is provided

burnProof(bytes4,bytes,bytes,bytes4,uint.notice: Checks the correctness of burn proof

ccBurn(uint256,bytes,uint8,bytes).notice: Burns teleBTC and records the burn request

disputeBurn(bytes,uint256[]).notice: Slashes a locker if she did not paid a cc burn request before its deadline

disputeLocker(bytes,bytes4[],bytes,bytes.notice: Slashes a locker if they issue a tx that doesn't match any burn request

isTransferred(address,uint256).notice: Shows if a burn request has been done or not

setProtocolPercentageFee(uint256).notice: Changes protocol percentage fee for burning tokens

setSlasherPercentageReward(uint256).notice: Changes slasher percentage reward for disputing lockers

setTransferDeadline(uint256).notice: Changes deadline of executing burn requests
